title: CFC Annotator: A Cluster-Focused Combination Algorithm for Annotating Electronic Health Records by Referencing Interface Terminology
details: S Zhou, H Liu, P Sen, Y Perl, MKH Dehkordi
abstract: In this paper, we present a novel algorithm designed to address the challenge of annotating electronic health record (EHR) text using an interface terminology dataset. Annotated text datasets are essential for the continued development of …
